alert.note: Alert for Gillespie (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 1:51PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Gillespie County through 230 PM CDT... At 151 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Luckenbach, or 9 miles southeast of Fredericksburg. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stonewall, Blumenthal, Luckenbach, Cain City, Albert, Grapetown, Rocky Hill, LBJ State Park and LBJ National Historical Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
